trip_info.description: A great sight to see. Something that you do not normally see.
A great place for fresh food and slight ocean view! I find it to be great for kids, but adults can have fun too!
Lots of mini stores and markets, you can find plenty of small gifts here!
You can see a few tech companies located on this street, and there is a pretty huge outdoor mall there too (at least I think it seems like a mall to me!)
I am still travelling and searching for more hidden gems in the city! Visit my page later to see the updated posts!
